评论详情: Way oversized and the chest area was even more oversized than the rest. It's sized as a small but it fit like a size large with an XXL chest. Bummer. Liked the color and fabric and idea but overall not for the petite person

Material quality is perfect. Overall comfort was super nice. I would get a size bigger if you are going to use the corset on the side of the dress. Not much stretchiness to it at all. But Very tight flattering beautiful dress. The smell of the dress was like any other brand new clothes you get. Zipper quality is very strong & holds very well. You can wear this dress anyway of the week. You can wear as a costume, you can wear out for date night or just for your outfit of the day! You will definitely turn some heads with this dress!! If you wanna be & feel sexy I would say this is the dress for you!
I bought this dress for a spooky convention I had to go to and it is SO flattering.
Got so many compliments!
I loved the velvet feel, very comfortable, and fitting. I did however accessorize for the look I was going for, but over all I had no issues. I ordered a large!
The sizing is wrong and now they’re charging for a return, which is so messed up. The quality is poor in general.

Keep in mind this does run small. I bought the 3X and usually wear a 1x/2x but used the size chart. First impression taking it out of the package “oof this is very small!” But decided to try it on just in case. While putting it on I’m still convinced it’s way too small and won’t fit. Once I got it on and looked in the mirror 😱 it’s perfect! Fit like a glove! It’s tight but in the best way possible! I’m OBSESSED!!!!!! the one strap I did break but that’s a very easy fix ☺️☺️☺️
I was nervous about buying it at first but I'm glad I did! Absolutely beautiful dress
Throw away garment. Not good for more than 1 use
watch the size you order, i normally wear a medium and i have ordered a large and a 2XL, and both still do not fit, dress is cheaply made and feels like paper on skin.

This dress is perfect! The quality is perfect (for the price): The velvet looks and feels nice, the dress is well constructed. The color matches to the image (jet black). Even the cross looks nice too.  I ordered 1 size up because I wanted to make sure I am comfortable, and it was the best choice, since the dress does not stretch much. It fits perfectly!  My measurements are 95cm - waist 78cm - hips 106cm - I am 164 cm / 5’4 tall.

Great fabric feel Just a little cheap in Material. I don’t recommend For the big chested ladies, Definitely one to two sizes up maybe even three depending on how big your chest area is. Also go up to your butt cheeks if you got a big rear end so be mindful of that.

Never sure about clothes off Amazon but I’m really delighted with this dress, especially for the price. The velvet is lovely and the fit is actually incredible. It suits my body and hugs without being skintight, makes me feel beautiful, honestly. The lace is a nice touch and better quality than I ever expected, the entire dress is.

评论概述: Cute and Well Constructed, Not Plus Friendly
评论详情: I love this dress a lot which is why I’m giving it four stars despite the sizing being WAYYY off. The size 3X fits like a US Large, even though I followed the measurements given. I can still get it on just fine, but it’s definitely bodycon on me. The construction is really nice though. The velveteen is soft and not sheer at all. The lace is also soft and not scratchy.  Because of the low cost, I plan on altering it myself, just beware if you have a large bust and hips!
My daughter usually an xl and it did not fit. Tried a 3 xl and still did not fit. No give in the fabric. Runs super small.
I used this as my halloween costume and loved it. Comfortable and great length not too short. 10/10

评论概述: Runs small listen to the reviews
评论详情: Listen to the reviews on this one! This dress runs small. I wear an extra large and a size 16 in dresses. I got the 2x. It is really snug around the waist.  It also comes with a cross which does have Jesus on it. No idea why,but the cross is sewn onto the bust. The dress does not have a normal amount of stretch,it has some,but if you order a size too small it will be tight on you.

I was really worried this was going to be too short I have thick thighs and butt and they usually stick out of dresses like this but I’m glad I took a chance perfect coverage! I haven’t threaded the corset yet but overall very happy great fit, comfortable, and super cute.

I got a size small. I’m 5’3 and 128 pounds, and it fits like a glove, super comfortable. The arms are a little tight, not a lot of arm movement happening there but it’s beautiful, it’s not see through. It’s a bit stretchy in the waist area. It has shein quality and I love shein so that’s the best way to describe it.
I ordered a 3x in this product. When I received my package the dress was more like a large if anything. I was very disappointed that it didn't fit.
I was so sad. I’m a true XXL. And this fit like a medium. I couldn’t get it over my chest. The dress is super cute and decent quality, the sizing is just inaccurate.

It was a very cute design, it fit nicely everywhere except my chest. The lacing around the chest area doesn't really stay up because of the heavy cross detail, and the straps were a little slippery. Had it fit my chest I would have kept it, I liked the lace cutouts in the skirt
I bought this dress so I can feel beautiful again and it didn’t fit :( I’m not that big… I wear 16 in pants and a large in shirts and a xxxl didn’t fit… Cute dress but a shame…
